--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, <apedraza@v...> wrote:
>

limited)

I have a simple oval horn tsuba that I'm sure is
of Japanese origin on a Shinshinto tanto, so
I guess horn tsuba existed. I would think only
for small decorative blades. Horn certainly wouldn't
be "battle worthy" on a katana size blade.

Rich S
